column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Had the deep dish pizza and it was okay. Not really a fan of theirs or giordanos
column2: but when in Chicago... The customer service was great! We ordered half cheese half sausage and they accidentally gave us all sausage
column3: so our waiter didn't make us pay for it. We didn't even ask for that or complain at all
column4: they just offered to not make us pay the bill. It was super nice of them
column5: id def go back (but order something other than the deep dish) not my thing lol
